oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Political poster urging people to "Vote Kennedy for President."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Broadsides; Presidential elections; Political posters; Labor unions
Kennedy, John F. (John Fitzgerald), 1917-1963; United States - Politics and government - 1961-1963; Johnson, Lyndon B. (Lyndon Baines), 1908-1973; Campaign literature
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Labor's Committee for Kennedy & Johnson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The 1960 presidential campaign set John F. Kennedy and Lyndon B. Johnson against Richard Nixon and Henry Cabot Lodge. Kennedy won in a very close vote.
